title: TASTES OF HELL'S KITCHEN
sub_title: GET $30 HOTEL CREDIT JUST FOR EATING OUT IN HELL'S KITCHEN.
long_desc:
You're in for a culinary delight when you stay at our Hell's Kitchen hotel. The diverse neighborhood hosts cuisine from all across the world. In just one block, you can taste a continent's worth of food. Along 9th Avenue, you'll find juicy South American steaks, delectable Italian, and spicy Indian. Now, we have a special Hell's Kitchen hotel package that lets you taste more when you stay at the WJ.

Get a $30.00 hotel credit when you dine in Hell's Kitchen.

We will credit your total hotel bill $30.00 when you show us a restaurant receipt from one of our partner restaurants, listed below.

Some of these Hell's Kitchen restaurants also offer special discounts for The WJ’s guests. Present your room key when you place your order.

  • Brickyard Gastropub – 9th Avenue between 52 & 53 Streets – 10% OFF
  • BASERA – Indian Bistro – 9th Avenue between 50 & 51 Streets – 20% OFF
  • Maria Pia – Italian – 51st Street between 8th  and 9th Avenue – 10% OFF
  • Rico South American Steakhouse – 9th  Avenue between 52 & 53 Streets – A complimentary signature drink – Picso Sour.
  • Tout Va Bien – French Bistro – 51st Street between 8th and 9th Avenue – 10% OFF
  • Cantina Rooftop – 48th Street between 10th and 11th Avenue-10% OFF

Conditions:

  • Only for registered guests of The Washington Jefferson Hotel
  • The meal must be consumed during your stay.
  • Receive a $30.00 credit on your total hotel bill, one per room, per stay, only when you book the "Tastes of Hell’s Kitchen” package directly on our website.
  • A restaurant’s receipt must be presented to Front Desk on the day of the meal.
  • Cannot be combined with any other specials or promotions.  
  • 2 nights minimum stay required.
  • Participating restaurants and offered discounts are subject to change without prior notice.
